name: Playground Simulator
description:
Welcome to the Playground! Have fun!

This is my first game. I built it in one weekend. This is the end result of that weekend. 
It isn't a full game. It's just a prototype. I don't know how big the game is going to get,  or what I will be adding to it, or what direction it is going in, but I will be updating it for the next couple months, at least. 

Also, be on the lookout for more games coming down the pipeline.
